result.eng: The money was gone by the end of the month.
result.ga: bhí an t-airgead ídithe faoi dheireadh na míosa
result.orig: bhí an t-airgead ídithe faoi dheireadh na míosa
result.html: bhí an t-airgead ídithe faoi dheireadh na míosaThe money was gone by the end of the month.
result.ponchtml: ḃí an t-airgead ídiṫe faoi ḋeireaḋ na míosaThe money was gone by the end of the month.

result.eng: Have you noticed that she is gone?
result.ga: ar thug tú faoi deara go bhfuil sí imithe
result.orig: ar thug tú faoi deara go bhfuil sí imithe
result.html: ar thug tú faoi deara go bhfuil sí imitheHave you noticed that she is gone?
result.ponchtml: ar ṫug tú faoi deara go ḃfuil sí imiṫeHave you noticed that she is gone?

result.eng: I'll be gone by that time.
result.ga: beidh mé imithe faoin am sin
result.orig: beidh mé imithe faoin am sin
result.html: beidh mé imithe faoin am sinI'll be gone by that time.
result.ponchtml: beiḋ mé imiṫe faoin am sinI'll be gone by that time.

result.eng: You will be gone by that time.
result.ga: beidh tú imithe faoin am sin
result.orig: beidh tú imithe faoin am sin
result.html: beidh tú imithe faoin am sinYou will be gone by that time.
result.ponchtml: beiḋ tú imiṫe faoin am sinYou will be gone by that time.

result.eng: My husband has been gone for a long time.
result.ga: is fada m'fhear céile imithe uaim
result.orig: is fada m'fhear céile imithe uaim
result.html: is fada m'fhear céile imithe uaimMy husband has been gone for a long time.
result.ponchtml: is fada m'ḟear céile imiṫe uaimMy husband has been gone for a long time.

result.ga: tá a chuid gruaige beagnach imithe
result.orig: tá a chuid gruaige beagnach imithe
result.html: tá a chuid gruaige beagnach imitheHis hair is almost gone.
result.ponchtml: tá a ċuid gruaige beagnaċ imiṫeHis hair is almost gone.

result.eng: According to the neighbours, they have gone on holiday.
result.ga: dar leis na comharsana tá siad imithe ar saoire
result.orig: dar leis na comharsana tá siad imithe ar saoire
result.html: dar leis na comharsana tá siad imithe ar saoireAccording to the neighbours, they have gone on holiday.
result.ponchtml: dar leis na coṁarsana tá siad imiṫe ar saoireAccording to the neighbours, they have gone on holiday.

result.eng: People will tell stories about this when it's gone.
result.ga: beidh scéalaíocht ar an rud a bheas anseo nuair imeos sé
result.orig: beidh scéalaíocht ar an rud a bheas anseo nuair imeos sé
